name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
Weeks and Contents: 
1.	Topic sentences
2.	Participial construction 
3.	Dangling modifiers / Misplaced modifiers
4.	Unity and coherence 
5.	Parallelism / Illogical comparisons / Mixed construction 
6.	Narration: Moving through time 
7.	Punctuation: Commas, colon, dash, quotation mark 
8.	Description: Moving through space and time 
         Review 
         Midterm exam 

9.	Mechanics: Capital letters, italics, apostrophe, hyphen, numbers
10.	Exemplification: Writing with examples 
11.	Diction: Choice of words 
12.	Analysis by division: Examining the parts 
13.	Comparison and contrast: Showing similarities and differences 
14.	Definition: Clarifying terms 
15.      Review 
       Final exam
scorePolicy:
Full Attendance & Earnest Participation 5% --- Anyone with more than three absences from class will receive a failure grade. Requests for leave of absence should be reported before or three days afterwards.       
2.  Pop Quizzes, Tests, Assignments (35%) --- No make-up or delayed assignments is allowed.      
3.  Mid-term Exam (30%)             
4.  Final Exam (30%)
